price: Isa sanaan wanti garaalee isaanii keessa jiruufi gogaaleen (isaanii) bayfama.
arabic: يُصۡهَرُ بِهِۦ مَا فِي بُطُونِهِمۡ وَٱلۡجُلُودُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yuṣ'haru bihi mā fī buṭūnihim wal-julūdu
